audioText: Nous connaissons tous les secrets pour organiser une fête d'anniversaire surprise parfaite.
question: What do we all know according to the speaker?
options: The secrets to organizing a perfect surprise birthday party.
The best places to buy birthday decorations.
How to choose the right birthday presents.
The most popular birthday party themes.
explanation: The text states 'Nous connaissons tous les secrets pour organiser une fête d'anniversaire surprise parfaite' - We all know the secrets to organizing a perfect surprise birthday party. 'Connaissons' is the present form of 'connaître' (to know), first person plural.
